website_summaries.verdict: These twin-over-full bunk beds with drawers will meet most of any bedroom's needs.
pros: Quality hardwood construction with a staircase rather than a ladder
The built-in drawers provide tons of storage, and the twin-over-full design is good for one older and one younger child
A nice piece to tie the bedroom together
cons: Difficult assembly, and drawer bottoms are not secure

customer_reviews.title: Frusterated
customer_reviews.text: This bed is nice EXCEPT the quality isn't all that great. The bottom stair already broke on the edge. It's wiggly and we have retightened ALL bolts 2 times already. Not too happy with this bed. I really thought it was going to be a little better quality then it actually is.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Helpful

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kiddies bed
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this bed was arrived so quickly, that thought the delivery was for something else. I Bought this for my kids and they absolutely love it. The assembly was a little cumbersome but one would have to expect that, there’s a lot of packaging and double wrapping but short of that, if you are somewhat handy, then you’ll be good. It took me about 4.5 hours to get it all set up by myself, with powered tools. The look on my kids face was totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: angelo

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: was as advertised we looked at several beds at local retailers and were disappointed at the quality for the price. Took a chance on ordering this unit and it was worth the price. Put it together by myself so that made it a little more difficult but it still only took about three hours. Would purchase this bed again.
customer_reviews.author: ken wright

customer_reviews.title: Great bunk bed for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I had Amazon install because it seemed from other people it takes patience and a long time which I have zero patience with putting together furniture. I got it for my son and daughter and they love it. The drawers work fine and wood is sturdy. I think they could have made a better bed base so more weight could be on it, but my kids are small so not an issue at this point.
customer_reviews.author: kceezie

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: This product is difficult to assemble, but once assembled it is stable, and looks great. The finish on this bed is gorgeous. The drawers work well. We were able to turn the drawers around successfully. Most importantly, my daughter likes it. So does my cat. The only complaint I have is concerning the instructions. They were difficult to make sense of. I have assembled furniture from many different manufacturers, and this one was among the worst. The end result however was definitely worth the headache. It really is a nice bed.
customer_reviews.author: Robin DeWhitt

customer_reviews.title: beautiful hardwood. 3 hour assembly 2 people
customer_reviews.text: Came in 7 boxes, well packaged. This is solid hardwood and looks beautiful. It was easy to assemble. I used an impact driver to speed things up. Be careful as you open the boxes to not use a knife like I did or you may mark the wood accidently. It took me probably 3 hours with the help of another to do this. I have an 8 inch memory foam matress on the beds and they fit perfectly. Drawers are very sturdy. I highly recommend this for anyone who wants stairs over a latter for a bunk bed.
customer_reviews.author: NoPuntIntended

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, sturdy, gorgeous finish. The kids love these beds, and I have no worries with them destroying it. Takes some time to assemble (1-2 hours), but if you're handy it's not too difficult. I've since had to take them apart and reassemble to move to another bedroom, and was able to do it by myself. Overall a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Dan K.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his bed so far! Assembly wasn’t awful. It comes in several giant boxes, so be prepared for a scheduled delivery as other posters have said. It only took my husband a couple of hours to assemble one evening. Bed seems to be well-made, and drawers all slide easily. We are very happy with our purchase and think the bed was a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Maura

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this, as do my grandchildren. The instructions left a little to be desired, and a small retouching pen for the inevitable scrapes that occur while putting it together would be helpful. My husband and I put these together over a couple of days which wasn't bad for two seniors with back issues. We did have two sets, needless to say the second set went together much more easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Value is amazing, HIGHLY RECOMMEND, 3rd party Shipping issues.
customer_reviews.text: The Value for money is there guys! Don't waist money on going to a big furniture store in town, just wait a week or 2 for this beauty! My girl's love the Bed. The options we had in town were horrible & WAYYY over priced! Easy to assemble took about 2 hours to assemble completely. Only hassle I had was with the 3rd party shipping, the number given had a horrible automated system & once my shipment arrived in my city the 3rd party company took an extra 3 days to deliver it due to forgetting to put it on the truck??? lol literally that's what they said to me...
customer_reviews.author: Ben Nevarez

customer_reviews.title: Handling and care for a higher cost
customer_reviews.text: The price for the twin/full you will over pay close to $400 more for a 4 piece kit I ended feeling like a sucker for spending $777 the posting did not give you the option for a full/full you have to look for it and then one hex screws was bent and parts where scratch I manage to repair it my self did not have time to send it back but for $777 I expected better handling for the manufacture I'm a handyman at home and mange to fix it but for those that don't know they THE NEXT CUSTOMER WILL EXPECT BETTER HANDLING FROM THE MANUFACTURE!
customer_reviews.author: loyda escobar

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put it together!
customer_reviews.text: Even though I’m some what handy this is real easy to put it together the big parts comes already assembled!
customer_reviews.author: JCLproject

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Solid wood and very sturdy with 2 boys who like to play on the bed.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan mills

customer_reviews.title: Great bed!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bed. Took about 2 hrs for hubby to assemble. You will need another person to help put the twin bed on top. Note: the panel that holds the bottom drawers is not attached to the bed so it slides back. One of the way to prevent it is to screw the stoppers at the back of the bed. Overall, we like this bed very much.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color and great delivery service
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color and great delivery service. The drawers are nice, but the bottoms of the drawers are cheap and not secure. I had my son's pajamas and pushed right through the bottom. I wasn't pushing hard. I noticed all of the drawers were easily pushed through.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble. The wood is solid. Good height. Kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Chatele

customer_reviews.title: Great Bunk Bed!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase. My husband was able to put the bunk together in two hours. The quality is great! I did have a problem with delivery but the seller was extremely helpful and solved the problem quickly and professionally! My daughters love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mommytotriplets

customer_reviews.title: I bought this bed for my girls and they love it. There is a ton of storage and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed for my girls and they love it. There is a ton of storage and it is well made. The customer service is incredible as well. I was missing several screws and I contacted them and emailed me within 20 minutes of sending the email that they had sent the screws and I received them 3 days later. Would buy furniture from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Johanns

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bed!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bed!!! I love it as well as my little girls. Took about 3 hrs. To set up. The instructions were a bit confussing but we figured it out.
customer_reviews.author: MMW

customer_reviews.title: We love this for our boys
customer_reviews.text: We love this for our boys! It was fairly easy to put together and took about 2 hours with help from my father in law to help secure here top on. Very sturdy and great storage!
customer_reviews.author: Snorman

customer_reviews.title: Great bed!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bed! I put it together myself with no help on assembly and I had just had a baby!! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Shana Olivas

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy Construction Kids love it Easy to assemble with 2 people Looks fantastic
customer_reviews.author: LAS

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of furniture for price!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our twins' bedroom. Great piece of furniture for the price. Sturdy and easy to put together. Kids love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Theodore, Rochester

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy and Quality Bed!!
customer_reviews.text: We are thrilled with this bunk bed! It is very sturdy and a quality product! Also, they did a great job with directions and putting it together was not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Caissey

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and good quality. Very doable to assemble. Looks really nice. Love the drawers underneath. My 3 year old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet T.

customer_reviews.title: Great bed
customer_reviews.text: We have had this bed for about 3 months and my kids love it. It is more sturdy than you would think once it is together.
customer_reviews.author: Chunky

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made, very sturdy, and we love it. Takes some time to put it together, but definitely worth the effort. Storage space is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: researchingmom

customer_reviews.title: Paint odor persist
customer_reviews.text: The paint odor of this product persists for months. Strongly not suggest to buy this bed for your kids if you don't want them get sick.!
customer_reviews.author: lambeef

customer_reviews.title: Great Bunk Beds!
customer_reviews.text: Bunk beds are great, girls ages 9 and 10 are very happy! Delivery was easy, installation took about 4 hours, well worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: vigil

customer_reviews.title: Love this bed!!
customer_reviews.text: We couldn't be more pleased on how well made this bed is, its so sturdy I feel completely comfortable with my almost 4 year old lil girl playing on the top, she Loves her new big girl bed. was really easy to put together took my husband and I about 2 hours with the help of a very excited child helping.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Good bunk bed
customer_reviews.text: Good bunk bed. My only complaint would be that even after tightening all the screws, they don't seem to as sturdy. Still creaks and moves about when kids get in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Nidhin Pad

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. Easy step by step installation.
customer_reviews.text: Nice beds. Better if add some extra bolts. took me about 4 hrs or less to put together. Help is better, alone is more difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan A. Girwar-nath

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved the wood finish very satisfied I do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just as pretty as in the photo. The wood is soft so it dings and scratch easily.
customer_reviews.author: TScott

customer_reviews.title: Semi easy to put together especially because we used power tools
customer_reviews.text: Semi easy to put together especially because we used power tools. Great quality and looks beautiful. The stairs are much safer than the ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Name

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was great kids love the bunkbeds and mom likes the storage
customer_reviews.author: Mary L Henson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bunks!
customer_reviews.text: It is a BEAUTIFUL set. So safe with the stairs vs a ladder. Very nice wood. My kids love their awesome beds!!!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Farmer Jr

customer_reviews.title: I love this piece. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Truly a great piece of furniture. Quality is super. My 30 yr old daughter and me (mom-62) put this together with no help but the instructions and tools provided (with exception of screwdriver needed which was noted in the instructions).
customer_reviews.author: Haw

customer_reviews.title: My kids absolutely love this bed
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely love this bed. It is very sturdy and we love the steps rather than a ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Consuelo

customer_reviews.title: We purchased this because of the great reviews. I am not impressed with the construction
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this because of the great reviews. I am not impressed with the construction, but worth the money spent!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

product_meta.title: Mission Twin Over Full Staircase Bunk Bed with 3 Drawers in Merlot Finish
product_meta.description: VERY IMPORTANT - A CURRENT PHONE NUMBER MUST BE PROVIDED AT TIME OF ORDER SO WE MAY CALL AND ARRANGE YOUR DELIVERY APPOINTMENT. WE CANNOT SHIP WITHOUT A PHONE NUMBER. This beautiful Mission Twin Over Full Staircase Bunk Bed with 3 Drawers in Merlot Finish is the best choice for your bedroom. This delightful bed set is made of a Solid Wood Construction made to last for years to come. This bed set is Mattress Ready and Accommodates Eight Inch Mattress. Meets All ASTM and CPSC Specifications.
feature_bullets: Meets All ASTM and CPSC Specifications

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars75 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
